title: Website heading
content:
It's the main heading from [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171531/http:/thadkopec.com/) website. What font is that?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171531im_/http:/typophile.com/files/0003768921_100_6309.png)

Font: 

 Plantagenet 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171531/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [0003768921\_100.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171531/http:/typophile.com/files/0003768921_100.png) | 39.21 KB |
author: _savage

comments.content:
Plantagenet (Plantagenet Cherokee bundled with Mac OS and MS-Windows operating systems):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/tiro/plantagenet/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171531/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tiro/plantagenet/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/tiro/plantagenet/")
